mapper.select: select count(1) nowInvestPersonsTotal from (select t.TOTAL from (select (a.DRAW_MONEY+a.NO_DRAW_MONEY+a.NO_USE_MONEY+a.COLLECTION+a.FIRST_BORROW_USE_MONEY+IFNULL(cur.TOTAL,0)+IFNULL(fix.fixCapitalTotal,0)+IFNULL(coll.fixInvestNoTotal,0)) as TOTAL from (select ID from rocky_member a where 1=1) m LEFT JOIN rocky_account a on m.id = a.USER_ID LEFT JOIN t_cur_account cur on m.id = cur.USER_ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT USER_ID,SUM(c.ACCOUNT) as fixCapitalTotal FROM t_fix_tender_detail c where c.status in(0,1) GROUP by USER_ID) fix on m.id = fix.USER_ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT USER_ID,SUM(co.INTEREST) as fixInvestNoTotal FROM t_fix_collectionrecord co where co.status=0 GROUP by USER_ID) coll on m.id = coll.USER_ID) t) t1 where t1.TOTAL>100

select (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(money),0) FROM rocky_accountlog WHERE TYPE='web_recharge' AND (remark='实名与手机认证通过奖励' or remark='邮箱、手机及实名认证通过奖励') AND user_id!=-1 and ADDTIME >= #{beginTimeSec} and ADDTIME <= #{endTimeSec}) as realnamePassAwardTotal,
( SELECT IFNULL(SUM(money),0) FROM rocky_accountlog WHERE TYPE='web_recharge' AND (remark LIKE '%您推荐的用户%' OR remark = '首充1000奖励费用') and ADDTIME >= #{beginTimeSec} and ADDTIME <= #{endTimeSec} ) as generalizeRegisterTotal,
(SELECT IFNULL(SUM(money),0) FROM rocky_accountlog WHERE TYPE='web_recharge' AND remark ='系统每月奖励10元，资金已到账。' and ADDTIME >= #{beginTimeSec} and ADDTIME <= #{endTimeSec}) as monthFirstAwardTotal,
(SELECT IFNULL(SUM(money),0) FROM rocky_accountlog WHERE TYPE='offline_recharge_award' and ADDTIME >=#{beginTimeSec} and ADDTIME <= #{endTimeSec}) as offLineRechargeAwardTotal,
( SELECT IFNULL(SUM(monthfee),0) FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN money<=20000000 THEN money*0.002 WHEN (money > 20000000 AND money<=60000000) THEN money*0.0018 WHEN money>60000000 THEN money*0.0016 END AS monthfee FROM ( SELECT FROM_UNIXTIME(ADDTIME,'%Y-%m') AS moneth,SUM(money) AS money FROM rocky_rechargerecord r WHERE onlinetype=4 AND STATUS=1 AND TYPE=1 and ADDTIME >= #{beginTimeSec} and ADDTIME <= #{endTimeSec} GROUP BY FROM_UNIXTIME(ADDTIME,'%Y-%m') ) result ) t ) as sinaFeeTotal,
( SELECT IFNULL(SUM(money),0) FROM rocky_accountlog WHERE 1=1 AND TYPE='vip_cost' AND user_id!=-1 AND remark = 'vip认证通过' and ADDTIME >= #{beginTimeSec} and ADDTIME <= #{endTimeSec}) as vipIncomeTotal,
(SELECT IFNULL(SUM(C.fee),0) TOTALCASH FROM rocky_cashrecord C WHERE C.STATUS = 2 and VERIFY_TIME2 >= #{beginTimeSec} and VERIFY_TIME2 <= #{endTimeSec} ) as takeCashFeeTotal,
( SELECT IFNULL(SUM(money),0) FROM rocky_accountlog WHERE 1=1 AND TYPE='inverest_fee' and ADDTIME >= #{beginTimeSec} and ADDTIME <= #{endTimeSec} ) as interestFeeTotal,
( SELECT IFNULL(SUM(t.money),0)
FROM rocky_borrow b,( SELECT borrow_Id AS borrowId,a.money,a.addtime FROM rocky_accountlog a WHERE 1=1 AND TYPE='borrow_manage_fee' and ID_TYPE=0 ) t WHERE b.ID = t.borrowId AND b.borrowtype=3 and t.ADDTIME >= #{beginTimeSec} and t.ADDTIME <= #{endTimeSec}
) as netBorrowFeeTotal,
(select IFNULL(sum(FEE),0) from rocky_rechargerecord where onlinetype=1 and STATUS=1 and VERIFY_TIME >= #{beginTimeSec} and VERIFY_TIME <= #{endTimeSec}) as moneyLineReseive ,
(select IFNULL(sum(FEE),0) from rocky_rechargerecord where onlinetype=4 and STATUS=1 and VERIFY_TIME >= #{beginTimeSec} and VERIFY_TIME <= #{endTimeSec}) as sinaLineReseive,
( SELECT IFNULL(SUM(ACCOUNT),0) sumAccount FROM ROCKY_BORROW WHERE 1=1 and BORROWTYPE = 5 AND (STATUS = 4 OR STATUS = 5 OR STATUS = 42) and SUCCESS_TIME >= #{beginTimeSec} and SUCCESS_TIME <= #{endTimeSec} ) as dbAccountMoney,
( SELECT IFNULL(SUM(rbs.ACCOUNT),0) FROM rocky_b_transfer rbs WHERE rbs.STATUS =4 AND rbs.BORROW_TYPE =2 AND rbs.SUCCESS_TIME >= FROM_UNIXTIME(#{beginTimeSec}) AND rbs.SUCCESS_TIME <= FROM_UNIXTIME(#{endTimeSec}) ) as dyTransferAccountMoney, ( SELECT IFNULL(SUM(rbs.ACCOUNT),0) FROM rocky_b_transfer rbs WHERE rbs.STATUS =4 AND rbs.BORROW_TYPE =3 AND rbs.SUCCESS_TIME >= FROM_UNIXTIME(#{beginTimeSec}) AND rbs.SUCCESS_TIME <= FROM_UNIXTIME(#{endTimeSec}) ) as jzTransferAccountMoney, ( SELECT IFNULL(SUM(rbs.ACCOUNT),0) FROM rocky_b_transfer rbs WHERE rbs.STATUS =4 AND rbs.BORROW_TYPE =4 AND rbs.SUCCESS_TIME >= FROM_UNIXTIME(#{beginTimeSec}) AND rbs.SUCCESS_TIME <= FROM_UNIXTIME(#{endTimeSec}) ) as mbTransferAccountMoney, ( SELECT IFNULL(SUM(rbs.ACCOUNT),0) FROM rocky_b_transfer rbs WHERE rbs.STATUS =4 AND rbs.BORROW_TYPE =1 AND rbs.SUCCESS_TIME >= FROM_UNIXTIME(#{beginTimeSec}) AND rbs.SUCCESS_TIME <= FROM_UNIXTIME(#{endTimeSec}) ) as tjbTransferAccountMoney, (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(rbs.ACCOUNT),0) FROM rocky_b_transfer rbs WHERE rbs.STATUS =4 AND rbs.BORROW_TYPE =5 AND rbs.SUCCESS_TIME >= FROM_UNIXTIME(#{beginTimeSec}) AND rbs.SUCCESS_TIME <= FROM_UNIXTIME(#{endTimeSec}) ) as dbTransferAccountMoney, (
select IFNULL(sum(FEE),0) from rocky_rechargerecord where onlinetype=5 and STATUS=1 and VERIFY_TIME >= #{beginTimeSec} and VERIFY_TIME <= #{endTimeSec}
) as llFeeReseive, ( SELECT IFNULL(SUM(money),0) FROM rocky_accountlog WHERE 1=1 AND TYPE='transfer_manage_fee' and ADDTIME >= #{beginTimeSec} and ADDTIME <= #{endTimeSec} ) as transferManagerFree, ( SELECT IFNULL(SUM(money),0) FROM rocky_accountlog WHERE 1=1 AND TYPE='first_transfer_manage_fee' and ADDTIME >= #{beginTimeSec} and ADDTIME <= #{endTimeSec} ) as firstTransferManagerFree, ( SELECT TRUNCATE(IFNULL(SUM(FEE),0),2) FROM t_todraw_log WHERE `STATUS` = 1 AND ADDTIME >= FROM_UNIXTIME(#{beginTimeSec}) and ADDTIME <= FROM_UNIXTIME(#{endTimeSec}) ) as changeDrawMoneyFee, ( TRUNCATE( (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(r.LATE_INTEREST),0) FROM rocky_b_repaymentrecord r,rocky_borrow b WHERE r.`STATUS` = 1 AND r.WEBSTATUS = 1 AND r.BORROW_ID = b.ID AND b.BORROWTYPE = 3 AND r.REPAYMENT_YESTIME >= #{beginTimeSec} AND r.REPAYMENT_YESTIME <= #{endTimeSec} )-( SELECT IFNULL(SUM(MONEY), 0) FROM rocky_accountlog l,( SELECT DISTINCT r.id FROM rocky_b_repaymentrecord r,rocky_borrow b WHERE r.`STATUS` = 1 AND r.WEBSTATUS = 1 AND r.BORROW_ID = b.ID AND b.BORROWTYPE = 3 AND r.REPAYMENT_YESTIME >= #{beginTimeSec} AND r.REPAYMENT_YESTIME <= #{endTimeSec} ) r WHERE l.BORROW_ID = r.id AND l.TYPE = 'later_interest_back' ),2) ) as netBorrowOverdueFee FROM dual
SELECT IFNULL(COUNT(DISTINCT a.user_id),0) as LosePersonsTotal1 FROM rocky_account a,rocky_b_tenderrecord t WHERE a.total<100 AND a.user_id = t.user_id AND t.ACCOUNT>=100

SELECT IFNULL(COUNT(DISTINCT a.user_id),0) FROM ( SELECT A.USER_ID FROM rocky_account_day_log a WHERE a.total < 100 AND a.ADDTIME >= DATE(#{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}) and a.ADDTIME < DATE_ADD(DATE(#{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}),INTERVAL 1 DAY) ) A,rocky_b_tenderrecord t WHERE 1=1 AND a.user_id = t.user_id AND t.ACCOUNT>=100 and t.ADDTIME <= #{endTimeSec,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(temp.activityMoney*(0.5/100)),0) FROM ( SELECT t.user_id AS userId, SUM(t.ACCOUNT* CASE b.STYLE WHEN 4 THEN ROUND(b.TIME_LIMIT/30, 4) ELSE b.TIME_LIMIT END) AS activityMoney FROM rocky_b_tenderrecord t, rocky_borrow b WHERE 1=1 AND t.BORROW_ID = b.ID AND b.BORROWTYPE = 2 AND (t.STATUS=1 OR t.STATUS=2) and t.addtime >= #{beginTimeSecForforum} and t.addtime <= #{endTimeSecForforum} GROUP BY t.user_id ) temp
select IFNULL(SUM(money)*0.001,0) from rocky_rechargerecord WHERE onlinetype=6 AND `STATUS`=1 AND TYPE=1 and ADDTIME >= #{beginTimeSec} and ADDTIME <= #{endTimeSec}
SELECT IFNULL(SUM(MONEY), 0) FROM T_CUR_INTEREST_DETAIL where 1=1 and ADDTIME >= #{beginTime} and ADDTIME < DATE_ADD(DATE(#{endTime}),INTERVAL 1 DAY)

select (borrowrepaymentAccountTotal+fixrepaymentAccountTotal) as repaymentAccountTotal,(borrowinvestMoneyTotal+fixinvestMoneyTotal+firstinvestMoneyTotal+subscribeinvestMoneyTotal+firstZinvestMoneyTotal) as investMoneyTotal, t4.userName,t4.mobilenum,t4.realName,t4.registerTime,t4.investTime,t4.investMoney,t4.type,t4.source,t4.inviterName from( select t2.*,rm.USERNAME as userName,ma.MOBILENUM as mobilenum,ra.REALNAME as realName,FROM_UNIXTIME(rm.ADDTIME) as registerTime,rm.SOURCE as source, (select rmb.USERNAME from rocky_member rmb where rmb.STATUS=0 and rmb.id=rm.INVITERID limit 1) as inviterName,
(SELECT IFNULL(SUM((IFNULL(rbc.REPAY_ACCOUNT,0))),0) FROM rocky_b_collectionrecord rbc WHERE rbc.USER_ID=t2.userId and rbc.STATUS=0 ) as borrowrepaymentAccountTotal,
(SELECT IFNULL(SUM((IFNULL(tfc.REPAY_ACCOUNT,0))),0) FROM t_fix_collectionrecord tfc WHERE tfc.USER_ID=t2.userId and tfc.STATUS=0 ) as fixrepaymentAccountTotal,
(select IFNULL(SUM(IFNULL(btr.ACCOUNT,0)),0) from rocky_b_tenderrecord btr where btr.USER_ID=t2.userId and btr.STATUS in(1,2,-2) and btr.PARENT_ID is null and btr.FIRST_TENDER_REAL_ID is null and FROM_UNIXTIME(btr.ADDTIME) >= DATE(#{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}) and FROM_UNIXTIME(btr.ADDTIME) <DATE_ADD(DATE(#{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}),INTERVAL 1 DAY) ) as borrowinvestMoneyTotal,
(select IFNULL(SUM(IFNULL(rbs.ACCOUNT,0)),0) from rocky_b_subscribe rbs where rbs.USER_ID=t2.userId and rbs.STATUS in(3) and rbs.ADD_TIME >= DATE(#{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}) and rbs.ADD_TIME <DATE_ADD(DATE(#{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}),INTERVAL 1 DAY) ) as subscribeinvestMoneyTotal,
(select IFNULL(SUM(IFNULL(td.ACCOUNT,0)),0) from t_fix_tender_detail td where td.USER_ID=t2.userId and td.STATUS in(1,3) and td.ADDTIME >= DATE(#{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}) and td.ADDTIME <DATE_ADD(DATE(#{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}),INTERVAL 1 DAY) ) as fixinvestMoneyTotal,
(select IFNULL(SUM(IFNULL(fs.ACCOUNT,0)),0) from t_first_subscribe fs where fs.USER_ID=t2.userId and fs.STATUS=3 and fs.ADD_TIME >= DATE(#{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}) and fs.ADD_TIME <DATE_ADD(DATE(#{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}),INTERVAL 1 DAY) ) as firstinvestMoneyTotal,
(select IFNULL(SUM(IFNULL(btr.ACCOUNT,0)),0) from t_first_tender_detail btr where btr.USER_ID=t2.userId and btr.STATUS in(1) and btr.ADDTIME>= DATE(#{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}) and btr.ADDTIME <DATE_ADD(DATE(#{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}),INTERVAL 1 DAY) ) as firstZinvestMoneyTotal from( select * from (select * from( select rbt.user_id as userId,FROM_UNIXTIME(rbt.ADDTIME) as investTime, rbt.ACCOUNT as investMoney, if(rb.AREA_TYPE=1 or (rb.AREA_TYPE=0 and rb.AREA_CHANGE_TIME is not null) ,'新手标','散标') as type from rocky_b_tenderrecord rbt INNER JOIN rocky_borrow rb on rbt.BORROW_ID=rb.id where rbt.STATUS in(1,2,-2) and rbt.PARENT_ID is null and rbt.FIRST_TENDER_REAL_ID is NULL UNION ALL
select rbs.user_id as userId,rbs.ADD_TIME as investTime,rbs.ACCOUNT as investMoney,'债权转让' as type from rocky_b_subscribe rbs where rbs.STATUS in(3) UNION ALL
select fs.user_id as userId,fs.ADD_TIME as investTime,fs.ACCOUNT as investMoney,'直通车债转' as type from t_first_subscribe fs where fs.STATUS in(3) UNION ALL
select ftd.user_id as userId,ftd.ADDTIME as investTime,ftd.ACCOUNT as investMoney,'直通车' as type from t_first_tender_detail ftd where ftd.STATUS in(1) UNION ALL
select tftd.user_id as userId,tftd.ADDTIME as investTime,tftd.ACCOUNT as investMoney,if(fb.AREA_TYPE=1 or (fb.AREA_TYPE=0 and fb.AREA_CHANGE_TIME is not null) ,'新手宝',fb.name) as type from t_fix_tender_detail tftd INNER JOIN t_fix_borrow fb on tftd.FIX_BORROW_ID=fb.id where tftd.`STATUS` in(1,3) ) t order by t.investTime asc ) t1 group by t1.userId) t2 INNER JOIN ROCKY_MEMBER rm on t2.userId=rm.id and rm.STATUS=0
and rm.source=#{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
left JOIN rocky_realname_appro ra on ra.user_id=rm.id left JOIN rocky_mobile_appro ma on ma.user_id=rm.id where t2.investTime >= DATE(#{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}) and t2.investTime < DATE_ADD(DATE(#{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}),INTERVAL 1 DAY) order by t2.investTime ASC ) t4

select count(1) from( select t2.* from( select * from (select * from( select rbt.user_id as userId,FROM_UNIXTIME(rbt.ADDTIME) as investTime, rbt.ACCOUNT as investMoney, if(rb.AREA_TYPE=1 or (rb.AREA_TYPE=0 and rb.AREA_CHANGE_TIME is not null) ,'新手标','散标') as type from rocky_b_tenderrecord rbt INNER JOIN rocky_borrow rb on rbt.BORROW_ID=rb.id where rbt.STATUS in(1,2,-2) and rbt.PARENT_ID is null and rbt.FIRST_TENDER_REAL_ID is NULL UNION ALL
select rbs.user_id as userId,rbs.ADD_TIME as investTime,rbs.ACCOUNT as investMoney,'债权转让' as type from rocky_b_subscribe rbs where rbs.STATUS in(3) UNION ALL
select fs.user_id as userId,fs.ADD_TIME as investTime,fs.ACCOUNT as investMoney,'直通车债转' as type from t_first_subscribe fs where fs.STATUS in(3) UNION ALL
select ftd.user_id as userId,ftd.ADDTIME as investTime,ftd.ACCOUNT as investMoney,'直通车' as type from t_first_tender_detail ftd where ftd.STATUS in(1) UNION ALL
select tftd.user_id as userId,tftd.ADDTIME as investTime,tftd.ACCOUNT as investMoney,if(fb.AREA_TYPE=1 or (fb.AREA_TYPE=0 and fb.AREA_CHANGE_TIME is not null) ,'新手宝',fb.name) as type from t_fix_tender_detail tftd INNER JOIN t_fix_borrow fb on tftd.FIX_BORROW_ID=fb.id where tftd.`STATUS` in(1,3) ) t order by t.investTime asc ) t1 group by t1.userId) t2 INNER JOIN ROCKY_MEMBER rm on t2.userId=rm.id and rm.STATUS=0
and rm.source=#{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
where t2.investTime >= DATE(#{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}) and t2.investTime < DATE_ADD(DATE(#{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}),INTERVAL 1 DAY) order by t2.investTime ASC ) t4
select IFNULL(SUM(money)*0.002,0) from rocky_rechargerecord WHERE onlinetype=8 AND `STATUS`=1 AND TYPE=1 and ADDTIME >= #{beginTimeSec} and ADDTIME <= #{endTimeSec}
